mapper.select: SELECT B.*, U.USER_ID, U.USER_NIC FROM BOARD_COMM B,USERS U WHERE B.CBOARD_NO = #{cboard_no} AND B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_COMM (CBOARD_NO, CBOARD_TITLE, CBOARD_CONTENT, CBOARD_VIEWCNT, CBOARD_DATE, USER_NO, CBOARD_DELETE_CHK, COMM_BIG, COMM_MID, COMM_BIG2, COMM_MID2, COMM_UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_COMM.NEXTVAL, #{cboard_title}, #{cboard_content}, 0, sysdate, #{user_no}, 0, 200, 20, 400, 10, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_COMM WHERE COMM_BIG = 200 AND COMM_MID = 20
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_COMM_FILE (CBOARD_NO, CBOARD_FILE_NAME, CBOARD_FILE_USER_NAME, CBOARD_FILE_CNT) VALUES ( #{cboard_no}, #{cboard_file_name}, #{cboard_file_user_name}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(CBOARD_NO), 0) + 1 FROM BOARD_COMM_FILE WHERE CBOARD_NO = #{cboard_no}) )
mapper.select: SELECT BCR.CREPLY_NO, BCR.CREPLY_CONTENT, BCR.COMM_UPDATE_DATE, BCR.CBOARD_NO, BCR.CREPLY_DELETE_CHK, BC.COMM_BIG, BC.COMM_MID, U.USER_ID, U.USER_NO, U.USER_NIC FROM BOARD_COMM_REPLY BCR JOIN USERS U ON BCR.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN BOARD_COMM BC ON BCR.CBOARD_NO = BC.CBOARD_NO WHERE BC.COMM_BIG = 200 AND BC.COMM_MID = 20 AND BCR.CBOARD_NO = #{cboard_no} AND BCR.CREPLY_DELETE_CHK = 0 ORDER BY BCR.CREPLY_DATE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_COMM_REPLY (CREPLY_NO, CREPLY_CONTENT, CREPLY_DATE, CREPLY_GROUP, CREPLY_LEVEL, CREPLY_INDENT, CBOARD_NO, USER_NO, CREPLY_DELETE_CHK, COMM_UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_COMM_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{creply_content}, sysdate, 1, 1, 1, #{cboard_no}, #{user_no}, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(BCR.CREPLY_NO) countComment, BCR.CBOARD_NO FROM BOARD_COMM_REPLY BCR JOIN BOARD_COMM B ON BCR.CBOARD_NO = B.CBOARD_NO WHERE BCR.CBOARD_NO = #{cboard_no} AND B.COMM_BIG = 200 AND B.COMM_MID = 20 AND BCR.CREPLY_DELETE_CHK =0 GROUP BY BCR.CBOARD_NO
SELECT b.user_no FROM BOARD_COMM b WHERE b.CBOARD_NO = #{cboard_no} AND b.COMM_BIG = 200 AND b.COMM_MID = 20
